ARABIC: قُلْ مَن رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ ٱلسَّبْعِ وَرَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Say: 'Who is the Lord of the Seven Heavens and the Lord of the Mighty Throne?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Say: "Then who is the Lord of the seven skies? And who is the Lord of the mighty Throne?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Ask them: "Who is the Lord of the seven heavens, the Lord of the Great Throne?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Ask them, "Who is the Lord of the seven heavens and the Great Throne?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Say, “Who is the Lord of the seven heavens, and the Lord of the Tremendous Throne?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Say: "Who is (the) Lord of the seven heavens, and (the) Lord of the Great Throne"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Say: Who is the Lord of the seven heavens and the Lord of the mighty dominion?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Say: 'Who is the Lord of the seven heavens and the Lord of the mighty Throne?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Say: Who is Lord of the seven heavens, and Lord of the Tremendous Throne?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Say, "Who is the Lord of the seven heavens, and of the Glorious Throne?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Say thou: who is Lord of the seven heavens and Lord of the mighty throne?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Say, ‘Who is the Lord of the seven heavens and the Lord of the Great Throne?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Say: "Who is the Lord of the seven heavens, and the Lord of the Throne (of Glory) Supreme?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Say: "Who is (the) Lord of the seven heavens, and (the) Lord of the Great Throne?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Say: 'Who is the Lord of the seven heavens, and of the Great Throne'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Say, “Who is the Lord of the seven heavens, and Lord of the Splendid Throne?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Say, "Who is Lord of the seven heavens and Lord of the Great Throne?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:86] Say: ‘Who is the Lord of the seven heavens and the Lord of the Great Throne?’, that is, the throne (kursī).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Say) also to them, Muhammad: (Who is Lord of the seven heavens, and Lord of the Tremendous Throne?
